item.title: Mary add a quote by Garlfred Broderick
item.description: "The Lord spoke to her of his love for her-that she was his daughter, that he cared for her, that he had died for her. He said that he would have died if she had been the only one. He would have suffered at Calvary for her sins, if hers had been the only ones." -- Garlfred Broderick

item.title: Mary add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Give yourself permission to dream. Fuel your kids' dreams too. Once in a while, that might even mean letting them stay up past their bedtimes." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Mary add a quote by Ron Paul
item.description: "I'm convinced that you never have to give up liberties to be safe. I think you're less safe when you give up your liberties." -- Ron Paul

item.title: Mary add a quote by Ron Paul
item.description: "Under the United States Constitution, the federal government has no authority to hold states "accountable" for their education performance...In the free society envisioned by the founders, schools are held accountable to parents, not federal bureaucrats." -- Ron Paul

item.title: Mary add a quote by Thomas Paine
item.description: "These are the times that try men's souls. The summer soldier and the sunshine patriot will, in this crisis, shrink from the service of their country; but he that stands it now, deserves the love and thanks of man and woman. Tyranny, like hell, is not easily conquered; yet we have this consolation with us, that the harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph. What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly: it is dearness only that gives everything its value." -- Thomas Paine
